title: And Just Like That....Episode 8 Review - "Bewitched, Bothered and Bewildered"
itunes:title: And Just Like That....Episode 8 Review - "Bewitched, Bothered and Bewildered"
itunes:subtitle: The closest thing to our beloved SATC
description:
On this week's review of And Just Like That, we discuss our pleasant surprise with the light heartedness and sexy fun that we were so familiar with seeing in SATC. Did anyone else enjoy Charlotte's bathroom situation with Harry? And how did we really feel about Miranda's divorce conversation with Steve? We're still on the "Justice for Steve" train honestly.


Join us this week as we go down the rabbit hole on all things for the new episode of the Sex and the City reboot!


Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
